description: Ms. codex. Title from lower edge of text block. 31 lines per page. Written in medium small naskh in black ink with use of red. Dark cream paper with laid lines and pulp visible. Table of contents on fol. 1a-3a. Fol. 337b-339b : Blank, except inscription on fol 339b. Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the upper cover: "Fiqh 22". Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the pastedown of the upper cover: "Ḥāʼ 356". Copy completed on Yawm al-Sabt 8 Jumādá al-Thānī 970 by Aḥmad ibn Maḥmūd al-Rūmī (colophon, fol. 337a). Incipit: كتاب النفقات هذا الكتاب يشتمل على فصول الفصل الاول فى نفقة الزوجات Explicit: بطل فصار وجود الاذن والعدم بمنزلة والله تعالى اعلم بالصواب واليه المرجع والماب تم الجزء الثانى والحمد لله
author: Marghīnānī, Maḥmūd ibn Aḥmad, 1156 or 1157-1219 or 1220
abstract: Portion of a treatise on Ḥanafī law, a summary of the author's al-Muḥīṭ al-Burhānī fī al-fiqh al-Nuʻmānī, comprising Kitāb al-Nafaqāt to Kitāb al-Shirkah.
extent: 339 leaves: paper ; 258 x 180 (188 x 116) mm. bound to 258 x 183 mm.
title: Kitāb al-Dhakhīrah min al-Nafaqāt.
provenance: From the books of ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn Muḥammad (fol. 1a, see Islamic Manuscripts, Garrett no. 2518Y). Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: مرغيناني، محمود بن احمد
subject: Marghīnānī, Maḥmūd ibn Aḥmad, 1156 or 1157-1219 or 1220—Muḥīṭ al-burhānī fī al-fiqh al-Nuʻmānī. Abridgment
binding_note: Upper and lower covers made of dark brown leather over paper pasteboards, with a blind stamped central mandorla with two pendants on the vertical axis, corner pieces and an outer frame made of fillets. Central stamps, corner pieces and the inner border of the frame outlined in gold. Rebacked.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
